name: Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Mysteries of Human Body
name_original: Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Mysteries of Human Body
description:
Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Mysteries of Human Body is an educational adventure game developed by DataSun Software. It came out on 01-12-1999. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Mysteries of Human Body on PC.
